div.pre: 2362 Avignon (anc. Avennio), 1822 Burial: 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 1265 AR and 20 frags. Pot hoard Massalia: ob. (hemiob.?) Disposition: Avignon (Mus√©e Calvet) Duprat, RN 1910, p. 578, note 1 Rolland, RN 1959-60, p. 39; 1970, pp. 105-10, illus.
